attributes.contentHtml:
Jamie_ "never tried the services" - I think me and @Two and Daft can agree that when we used you for crystalhost, we had constant lagg with only a couple servers on the node, slow internet speeds (Panel proves that) and constant downtime.

it wasn't slow but it kept failing to communicate with discord/etc sometimes, it was annoying
servers werent that bad
